price: Na milima itaondolewa na itakuwa kama sarabi.
footnotes: Na milima itaondolewa baada ya kung'olewa mwahala mwake, na kuvurugwa, ikawa unaiona kama sura ya milima na hali hiyo ni kifusi tu kilicho rindikwa, kama uonavyo mangati, sarabi, unaona kama sura ya maji nayo si maji.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
